original_text: Then the Jewish leaders picked up stones again to throw at Jesus so that they could kill him.
korean_text: 유대인들이 다시 돌을 들어 치려 하거늘

sentences.original_text: Then the Jewish leaders picked up stones again
sentences.korean_translation: 그러자 유대 지도자들이 다시 돌을 들어올렸고

sentences.original_text: so that they could kill him
